The story revolves around two young men who witness a murder at a secluded farmhouse deep in the Northern California woods. They are tormented when one of them becomes savagely possessed and a gang of  "Rockabillies" seemingly from the 1950' s descends upon them to collect what is growing inside her.
The movie "Uglies" is known for its gripping storyline,出色的 acting performances, and poignant themes. It has received critical acclaim and has won numerous awards including two Academy Awards for Best Picture and Best Director, a Golden Globe Award for Best Foreign Language Film, an British Film Academy Award for Best British Film, and an Empire Film Magazine Award for Best British Film.
